Hi

Do not buy this cancer game.

Pros:
Fun to play with 4 other friends

Cons:
Killers camp your ass on the hook 70% of the time. 30% of the other times the killer will let you get of the hook, hunt you down again until you are dead and ignoring any other survivors during this process.

Devs favs killers so all nerfs goes to survivors and buffs killers.
Respawning hooks added in new patch so even if you destroy one, a new will appear again.

Devs favs killers so camping is allowed in anyform. Killers can even bodyblock survivors from unhooking survivors.

Killers can "charge" their abilities unfair like: 
Michael Myers stalk charge from tier 2 to 3, leave the bar at 99% so it takes you 0.1 sec to gain oneshot ability and being the fastest killer alive. 
Hillbilly can keep his chainsaw active and almost fully charged. which makes him charge forward and oneshot survivors.
Trapper have traps ( suprise!!! ) which you cannot escape 100% after attempt completed ( attempted once 13 times until the killer came and hooked me)

Pallets ( which is the only protection you have against killers) does not respawn so the longer the game goes, the bigger the chance is the killer will outrun you and hook your ass and camp you to death.

Oww yeah almost forgot, Killer perks makes it impossible for survivors to escape though stealth and cunning.
Wispers ( aoe detection )
Hex:Ruin ( small ass burning totem you have to destroy to being able to complete generators )
Nurse calling ( killer see you when you are healing or being healed )

Loved this game but since devs nerfs survivors all the time, And dont care about the concept of the game.
This game was about cunning and stealth, tricking the killer when chased. And as a killer to outwit the survivors when hunting them. NOW its all about camping survivors and having unbalanced perks mentioned above.

This game should be called Dead by Camplight.

I managed to demolish an entire team of survivors--except for one guy. I trumped around for three/four minutes, hearing nothing, and waiting for a generator to pop, or a trap to set off. Nothing. And then BLAM! GAME FUCKING OVER! HE WANDERED AROUND IN SILENCE UNTIL HE FOUND THE TRAP DOOR. "loool GET REKT NUUB". I'm so fucking done, dude.

Update: I changed to a positive review, because this game is really offputting at first. The community is still trash. But, as I played more, I found ways around the annoying pallet vaulting, and learned how to better manage my time as the killer. You have to sometimes make a decision between setting a survivor down, or letting the others unhook one. It's difficult to patrol generators, but it can be rewarding if you learn the survivors patterns. 
Game's not that bad. 7.5/10

Dead by Daylight is a good game, hits the spot well in terms of mechanics. I'm happy to reccomend it on that basis alone. The game is enjoyable from both the perspectives of the killer and survivor, and they feel fairly balanced. Being a survivor follows simple gameplay with minor complex detail featuring very heavy risk taking, creating extremely tense suspenseful moments in sessions. Progression relys a little less on levels (though still a considerable aspect) and more on the skill and accumulated knowledge of the player which I find to be an especially rewarding mix. Killer gameplay is considerably more complex and relatively more tactical, relying on cunning and trying as best you can to use the many mechanics available to track and chase survivors. New killers will struggle more than new survivors though, as progression for the killer is split a similar way as for survivors, but relies more heavily on both knowledge and skill.

However as much as I enjoy playing there are some flaws that really shouldn't be there.
There seems to be little consideration to mathmaking, where new killers are pitted against teams of seasoned survivors and vice versa. Lobby waiting times can sometimes be quite lengthy too. With a decent playerbase, there is no good reason to have both these issues simultaneously. There can sometimes be some lag in games, though I've experienced less of this than what others seem to have. I've noticed some bugs. Disconnects are also a semi-frequent problem where you can be kicked out of lobbies 15% of the time and, with great frustration, can be kicked out of the game roughly 5-10% of the time.

I'd like to be able to say the devs are great and working on this, but from what I can see it doesn't seem that way. They appear to have set focus on producing content for the game for it's longevity and for money. While the dlc is good and something I'd also reccomend they have clearly lacked as much focus or refused to work on the problems the game has.

Despite this I reccomend This game. It's very appropriately priced so If you're interested in the concept it should be worth the money, particularly when on sale.

Just awful, dull, repetative, poorly thought out and implimented even more poorly, buy depth instead, it'll kinda fill the hole this game should fill but doesn't.

The community is generally toxic and will complain (flame and troll) if you don't follow the 'rules' of being a killer which largely involves letting them rescue other players after you have gone through the long, dull process of catching them. It's a chore and it feels that way, even when you succeed it's dull.

The killers aren't scary and the game is balanced in such a way that survivors win a lot of the time, while playing survivor is slightly better, it's still shallow as a paddling pool, I'm bored of it already and while I normally like playing the hunters, in this game it's hardest to find a killer, not survivors in matchmaking. That says it all to me.

Don't buy it, there are so many other games that are better for the price.

Ya estuve jugando un buen rato a este juego, en diferentes oportunidades y siempre fué muy grato.
Por lo que hoy escribo este análisis aprovechando el sabor de boca que me ha dejado en esta ultima oportunidad. 

Les comento que yo soy mas de la antigua escuela, anteriormente no habia juegos multijugador por lo que siempre nos teníamos que arreglar en single. (tampoco esperabamos el multi, estabamos bien asi) 
Pero el furor de muchos (no el mio) fué cuando el Counter Strike comenzó con sus partidas Coop en LAN y todos salieron a cagarse a tiros para compartir un buen momento juntos. Pero por mi costumbre de antigua escuela nunca participe porque francamente no llamaba mi atención. Siempre me gustó jugar por mi cuenta y no tener que estar esperando a otros para hacerlo.
Pero un día me animé a probar este modo y ya para entonces estaba el multiplayer siendo este muy popular. Entonces comencé con Rust, Payday 2, entre otros. En ocasiones fué divertido y otras no tanto. (demasiado griterio y pavadas varias por parte de los demas) y eso me echaba atras en mas de una oportunidad. Pero este juego en particular les aseguro que siempre fué muy bueno. No hay chat de voz durante el juego!!!!! IDEAL PARA LOS IMBECILES QUE SE LA PASAN DICIENDO PELOTUDECES EN LA PARTIDA Y ROMPEN TODA LA AMBIENTACION DEL MISMO, ARRUINANDO LA EXPERIENCIA DE JUEGO DE LOS DEMAS. 
Y respecto al juego en sí, tiene lindos gráficos, cumple muy bien su objetivo y la verdad que tanto jugar con amigos como con gente desconocida, no deja de ser atrapante e interesante.  
Es de esos juegos que uno termina la partida y quiere mas!! , vamos por otra partida y cuando se termina...vamos por mas!!!!. O sea que organizamos 2 o 3 partidas y terminamos jugando 10. 
No pensé que me iba a enganchar con un juego multiplayer ya que son muy casuales todos estos pero francamente este superó ampliamente mis espectativas y me hizo dar cuenta lo que el multiplayer te puede dar. No siempre es malo.  
AHORA este tipo de métodos de juego son realmente interesantes para mi.  Y lo recomiendo ampliamente.
Si sos chapado a la antigua y no sos muy "multipleyero" pero te intriga conocer este mundo..entonces empezá por este, te aseguro que te va a dejar una buena sensación. 

[h1] Datos técnicos[/h1] 

El juego funciona muy bien, tiene arbol de progresos, skills, perks, items varios para usar y sacar provecho. 
Pero por sobre todas las cosas, es realmente entretenido. Uno puede elegir entre varios personajes. hay aproximadamente como 9 supervivientes y 7 asesinos (aprox) diferentes para usar, "TODOS" con sus particularidades.
El objetivo del juego es mientras 4 supervivientes intentan reparar 5 motores para activar la puerta de escape (sin hacer ruido), uno que es el asesino intenta colgarlos y masacrarlos brutalmente. 

[h1] El juego se encuentra muy activo en este momento. [/h1] 
De verdad recomiendo este juego, es muy bueno y cumple muy bien con su propósito. 

Obviamente encontrarás en ocasiones alguno que otro que no juega del todo "correctamente" bien. 
Como por ejemplo un asesino que no termina de matarte nunca, para sacar mas puntos y eso hace perder el tiempo a los demas. Pero también del lado del superviviente sucede que trollean al asesino. Pero esas cosas pasan en todos los multiplayer, ya que es inevitable porque depende de la persona ya y no del juego. 
Pero no abundan estos casos por suerte. Se dan en ocasiones, no siempre. 
La gente juega como debe y esta muy bien!. ;).

Recently really gotten into this game; and I can and will reccomend it for you to buy. (and hay its 40% off too :) ) 

The game is a 1 vs 4 survival horror in which a killer (choose from currently 4 free killers the other 3 can be obtained through DLC which also gives you a survivor) chases, hunts, kills or sacrifices the 4 survivors (choose from 7 free survivors) each character has its advantages through its unique perks but you can level each character whether it be a survivor or a killer to get there unique perks teachable so that you can take them on different characters. 

Theres are set maps but the contense inside them variates between each trial (game) for instance the basement can switch positions and the generators, hooks. barricades and alot of the walls in the game are also random. So each trial can be different providing endless hours of fun even though your playing the same game over and over. 

Some killers may seem overpowered at first but the more you play vs them the more you can see there weaknesses and strengths so you can learn to play agaisnt them. It works vise versa some killers may find a certain survivor with a certain perk overpowered but again the more you play the more you realize how to counter that survivors tricks. 

Theres only one problem I have really with the game is the Doctors new map which for me is just meh. But all in all this game is great to play alone or with friends. You might find yourself playing all night sometimes haha. Well I hope I helped convice you or not convince you to buy Dead by Daylight. :)

Thanks - Andro <3

This game is much fun.

Only problems I have encountered are sometimes toxic players but since their is no chat function in game all they really can do is try to annoy you with their gameplay, but I don't think that there are online games without toxic players. Other then that is that some players are abusing lag but hopefully the reporting system post game will help with that. Defenitly check this game out and its also lots of fun to play with friends. It was on sale. I wanted to see what the fuss was all about. Played it for an hour. Regret buying it.
As a survivor, there's no real reward in completing generators. Sure, you just move on to the next one (where there's 5 in total) and so on. Whenever the killer gets you, there is a "Press to wiggle" function. This gives you a chance to break free from the killer and escape. He then drags your ass over to a hook. where he will impel you, untill a survior comes to your aid. It would've been a great feature, if the hooks weren't  2 inches from each other. And if you are new to the game, and are a low level character, there's not much fun in it for you. You have to grind and grind your character to a certain level, before you can start to have a slight of a chance. And those perks includes things like tool boxes, which makes you repair generators faster, a simple flashlight so you can see! and so on. 
This game introduces itself in the worst way. Looks like fun when you watch someone else play it. And it doesn't explain you that you need to put hours into it, before you can perhaps, enjoy it.

杀鸡的制作组只考虑屠夫玩家的感受吗?每次更新都是加强屠夫 削弱人类 这几次更新下来板子和窗户削了 手电也削了 人类玩家真的毫无游戏体验可言 拿这次的新屠夫兔姐来说 一斧倒真的可怕 还有制作组认为杨永信太弱了 在重做 我想说 杨永信切换到放电模式守尸强无敌

  别的不说 就单纯说说守尸的话 这个问题从去年我接触这个游戏以来就一直没有得到解决 而新的屠夫上段机制更是鼓励屠夫玩家守尸 整个游戏环境变得很差

  我是不太理解制作组到底怎么想的 他们有没有自己玩下现在这个版本的游戏 感受一下人类玩家的感受?对我来说 现在已经完全没有什么人皇屠皇的说法了 因为一次次的削弱 人皇被迫变成了机皇 遛屠夫?不存在的 基本上被找到没多久就得上树 更何况现在手电也削了 没有可以拿来防身的东西 人类更苟不住了 

  而对屠夫玩家来说 优势这么大 几杀都不是事 就算真的把四个人类都杀死了 也无法真正得到认可
 反观以前版本的屠夫 对抗不过就是对抗不过 真正强的屠夫都是让我们心服口服的 

  其实有真正强的屠夫就会有真正强的人类 不能因为一些萌新屠夫被欺负几次 制作组就老觉得屠夫太弱了 萌新人类也是一路被挂树走过来的 制作组每次做的平衡性修改都很让我无语 新的人类技能又是鸡肋 但新的屠夫配件又那么强大 让人类拿什么来与屠夫抗衡?
  
  付导在黎明杀机咨询微信的更新下留言中有说到 这不仅仅是个杀人游戏 同时也是个逃生游戏。如果制作组只站在屠夫的立场考虑 而不为人类考虑 确实会流失很多玩家

     看着这一次次的更新下来 制作组逐渐把一手好牌打得稀巴烂 真的让人痛心疾首 虽然我玩这个游戏的时间也不多 区区600+小时 但我也是为这个游戏付出了许多心血的 就连我都禁不住对这个游戏感到失望 更别说那些花了非常多时间钻研这个游戏的人了

     我个人而言要先放弃这款游戏了 尽管我个人的退出并不会影响到什么  但我无法凭着以前的热情去强迫自己继续玩下去 我的心里还是期待着杀鸡能够做出一些确确实实能够使游戏得到平衡的改变的 只不过不知道那一天会不会到来

Good Variety of maps, perks, characters and killers, every game feels super intense where the killer doesn't just take the piss (happens rarely) but overall the gameplay is fun and enjoyable every time, yes there's some bugs however i'm yet to encounter them but it happens.

I still shit my self every time someone plays the nurse killer, find out for your self.
刺  刺激
来呀。。嗯

屎一样的匹配玩人全匹配去国外玩屠夫匹配不到人，让人充钱到是一套一套的，能吧匹配搞好别说充钱，寄大米给你们吃都行~越来越差了~
在来说说平衡性：
1：游戏本来就是恐怖竞技类游戏你加强屠夫我无话可说人本来就应该怕屠夫
2：屠夫现在配件一个比一个厉害
3：人类越跑越慢屠夫越追越快人类疲劳越来越长从40~60！？干脆改成只能用一次算了被屠夫追还无限疲劳（难道你在屠夫面前慢走）
4：现在玩人基本就是见屠夫必上钩子（还不论针不针对你）
5：玩屠夫还真是tm的好找成就感别跟我说什么人皇随便杀
6：段位除了和你匹配差不多段的也没什么用（段位高了还排不到人）
7：在来说说等候室就是不能打中文？歧视我们中国玩家？游戏里不能交流我理解等候室吹会牛也要用到汉语拼音，更别说一直匹配到国外玩家，（怪自己英文不好）
8：以前一直在讨论屠夫守尸体的问题你也的确改了，现在TM的还用守尸有时候真是希望队友别来救，来救还真是加速死亡
9：手电，齿轮，的削弱让人基本没什么带的欲望现在还有人带破坏手用工具箱去拆钩子或夹子（除了车队）
10：人类大部分技能都是废的~能用的技能有哪些你们不知道~还技能配合~跟别说去用血点点一些没用的传承技能
11：现在玩法基本就是队友上钩子为你争取修机时间~
最后：如果因为看了某某UP直播或视频来入手的小伙伴先买了进游戏体验1~2小时趁还能退款就赶紧吧~相信我你的一半时间是在等人和上钩子中度过的，溜屠夫别想了玩屠夫还能找点乐趣（如果你没花10多20分钟等人的话）
bello e emozionante.
优点：可以直接连服务器，没有新手教程，对新手不友好。缺点：排人有点久，排的人段位有点大，需要多宣传，是个好游戏。

Dead by Daylight - это когда в 4 человека чинишь генератор и вдруг подходит невидимый араб и ты ловишь маслину.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты заходишь в лобби, хочешь сыграть каточку, но четвертый выживший обязательно будет с него ливать в бесконечных поисках друга (мне плевать на всех - сам не играю и другим не даю). После чего эти ищейки узнают много нового о себе, о своих родственниках, и о том, с кем его мамка ходила в кино. 

Dead by Daylight - это когда вы вместе с маньяком кружите хоровод вокруг булыжника.

Dead by Daylight - это когда кудрявый может махать руками и ♥♥♥♥♥♥ пойми как сломать крюк.

Dead by Daylight - это когда очкарик может на дистанции 1337 километр помогать другим.

Dead by Daylight - это когда♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥баба может из травы делать препятсвия и ими же лечить раны.

Dead by Daylight - это когда баба с ростом как карлик и с -1 размером груди бегает быстрее гепарда.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты светишь маньяку фонариком в лицо, а в ответ получаешь пилой по имбальнику.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты видишь, как твой напарник убегает от маньяка... в твою сторону... и маньяк продолжает охоту ужe за тобой.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты сидишь в кукурузе и тут тебе в спину влетает пила.

Dead by Daylight - это когда уже надо открыть выход, ты попадаешь в капкан и тебя уносят в падик на крюк.

pretty good

There's a reason I have so many hours in this game. It is addictive, intense, and a blast to play. I've been playing since it released in 2016. I have seen this game evolve from 3 available killers to 21 and 4 available survivors to 23. A lot has changed and it has been (mostly) for the better. This game has some serious variety. All of the available killers mean that every single game is so drastically different. It makes every game interesting.

There is just no feeling like killing all of the survivors because of your own ability or evading the killer during a close game and escaping to safety. This game has stood the test of time and is absolutely worth trying out. There is no better time to jump into this game than right now.
